definition: (main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Don Quixote was written by Miguel de Cervantes and published in 1605.
sentences.chinese: 《堂吉訶德》由塞萬提斯所著，發表於1605年。
這是個堂吉訶德式的任務嗎？

sentences.english: Choose a couple from The Taming of the Shrew or Don Quixote to discuss.
sentences.chinese: 在《馴悍記》或《堂吉訶德》中選擇一對男女作討論。

sentences.english: He has also retold Gulliver's Travels, winner of the Kate Greenaway Medal with Don Quixote.
sentences.chinese: 他還新編格列佛遊記，在格林威獎得主與堂吉訶德。

sentences.english: Don Quixote is an outstanding comedy in the history of European literature.
sentences.chinese: 《堂吉訶德》是歐洲文學史上卓越的喜劇性文學作品。
